org.gbif.dwc.meta

Class DwcMetaFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.dwc.meta.DwcMetaFiles

  • public class DwcMetaFiles
extends Object
    Collections of static methods to work with Metadata files (e.g. metadata.xml, eml.xml) in the context of Darwin Core (archive) files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Optional<String> discoverMetadataFile(Path dwcLocation)
      Try to find a metadata file inside a DarwinCore folder or check the file name if the provided location is a file.
      static Archive fromMetaDescriptor(InputStream metaDescriptor)
      Read the provided meta descriptor (e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • fromMetaDescriptor

        public static Archive fromMetaDescriptor(InputStream metaDescriptor)
                                  throws SAXException,
                                         IOException,
                                         UnsupportedArchiveException
        Read the provided meta descriptor (e.g. meta.xml) and return a Archive.
        Parameters:
        metaDescriptor -
        Returns:
        a new Archive, never null
        Throws:
        SAXException
        IOException
        UnsupportedArchiveException

      • discoverMetadataFile

        public static Optional<String> discoverMetadataFile(Path dwcLocation)
        Try to find a metadata file inside a DarwinCore folder or check the file name if the provided location is a file. The test is strictly based on the file name. Usually, the metadata file is a EML file.
        Parameters:
        dwcLocation -
        Returns:
        name of the possible metadata file or @{code Optional.empty()} if none were found.
